unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: Voting Tendencies
question_text: A pollster asked $100$ random males and $100$ random females if they would vote for the Democratic candidate in the upcoming election for senator. If the pollster wanted to test whether a higher proportion of females leans Democratic, which hypothesis test should be chosen?

choices.text: Chi-squared test for goodness of fit.
